title: How to Colonize History
description:
Jesus is the most influential man in human history. This alone should qualify him for the title "Son of (the creator) God", yet Jesus' methods of colonizing history are regularly spurned as impractical the data not withstanding. Jesus seems again and again to take the long view, the VERY long view. One that not only includes his death but transcends it with resurrection. We see this early on in his career by heading to the Galilee and NOT taking up the sword because the sword eats as well as it gives. 

Dominion by Tom Holland https://amzn.to/2NV86K4
Eric Weinstein Portal #19 Bret Weinstein https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/kast-media-2/the-portal-2

To see the final cut you can see it here on the LSCRC channel. https://youtu.be/O5DRHL05JDQ

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
